document_data.mainbody:
Shoroz was a skilled sorcerer and the Chief Vizier of Caliph Abir al-Farhan in Hilm in the Pantheist League of interior Zakhara in 1367 DR.
Shoroz was quite tall but was stooped over.
Shoroz believed wholeheartedly in the caliphs vision for Hilm and worked diligently to help his vision become reality. He would often use his magic to disguise both himself and the caliph so they could walk among the common people of Hilm to discover their true interests and needs.
